physical_appearance: "The image shows a digital print, an artist's proof, and a slide. They are rectangular in shape. The background of the digital print and artist's proof are blue in colour. The background of the photograph shows the structure of a flight of stairs in a zig-zag orientation. The flight of stairs has red railings. A construction worker is depicted to be ascending the flight of stairs. He adorns a yellow helmet and carries a red pail. The image at the bottom shows a slide. It is in colour. It is held in place by a frame. On the borders of the frame, ""Z No. 1"" is stated at the top for the image at the bottom ""Tan Lip Seng
creator_1: Tan, Lip Seng, 1942- Tan, Lip Seng
